name: Cimaruta
description:
Play as a which beginning your career as a potion master. After recently graduating from which academy you set out to open your own store in the big city. But it's a tough world out there and its easy fail, you must make potions quickly if you want to survive. 

- summon ingredients from a pocket dimension

 - create potions to fulfil orders

- magically send order through the magic delivery box
